Key Match Events: Giannis Antetokounmpo scored 30 points and grabbed 12 rebounds
Milwaukee Bucks rallied from a 19-point deficit
Bucks outscored the Pacers 67-48 after halftime
Gary Trent Jr. hit two clutch 3-pointers late in the game
Damian Lillard missed all seven shots and committed two turnovers in the first half
